about_the_game:
• Embark on a riveting odyssey alongside Ethan Nelson, an unassuming adventure spirit leading an ordinary life. Your journey unfolds within the mysterious confines of Stonevale Mines, a place teeming with secrets and untold mysteries. As Ethan delves deeper into the labyrinthine passages of the mines, he stumbles upon a portal, a gateway to an alternate dimension.



  • In this newfound realm, you are thrust into a world brimming with challenges and enigmas. From perilous climbs and intense battles to daring jumps and cerebral puzzles, every step presents a test of your mettle. The landscapes are as varied as they are breathtaking, encompassing ancient temples, lush jungles, arid deserts, and snow-covered peaks. Each locale holds its own set of mysteries, urging you to unravel the secrets that lie hidden within.




  • Can you conquer the challenges that lay before you? The answers await those who dare to accompany Ethan Nelson on this extraordinary expedition, where the ordinary transforms into the extraordinary, and the line between reality and the unknown blurs into a tapestry of wonder and mystery.


  • Make sure to follow our Steam page, for upcoming posts and events, where you can find more information on the game, screenshots, special upcoming videos and much more!

About the Game

  • Embark on a riveting odyssey alongside Ethan Nelson, an unassuming adventure spirit leading an ordinary life. Your journey unfolds within the mysterious confines of Stonevale Mines, a place teeming with secrets and untold mysteries. As Ethan delves deeper into the labyrinthine passages of the mines, he stumbles upon a portal, a gateway to an alternate dimension.



  • In this newfound realm, you are thrust into a world brimming with challenges and enigmas. From perilous climbs and intense battles to daring jumps and cerebral puzzles, every step presents a test of your mettle. The landscapes are as varied as they are breathtaking, encompassing ancient temples, lush jungles, arid deserts, and snow-covered peaks. Each locale holds its own set of mysteries, urging you to unravel the secrets that lie hidden within.




  • Can you conquer the challenges that lay before you? The answers await those who dare to accompany Ethan Nelson on this extraordinary expedition, where the ordinary transforms into the extraordinary, and the line between reality and the unknown blurs into a tapestry of wonder and mystery.

name: Cosmic Horizons: Path of the Wanderer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5 9400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred), 1080p/30 fps, Medium Quality Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i7 9900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD, 1080p/60 fps, Epic Quality Settings

short_description: Take a Realm in Ethan's shoes in this Action-Adventure, singleplayer experience! Curiosity takes you to explore an urban legend, which will alter your reality to a whole new level- A journey to a secret world, filled with both stunning and scary.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
